Header.title: Welcome üëãüèæ
Header.paragraph: Hello, my name is Santana and I am passionate about client-side and server-side web develpment.

About.paragraph: I am a recent Full-Stack Web + Mobile Development graduate with an education background who loves building dynamic applications across a range of technologies. I am experienced in object-oriented programming; developing, editing, testing and debugging code.
